scripts.dev: npm run buildDev && NODE_PATH=./lib/client pm2 start ./build/main.js --watch
scripts.start: NODE_ENV=production NODE_PATH=./build/main.js pm2-runtime start ecosystem.config.js --env production
scripts.build: rm -rf build && webpack --mode production --config webpack.server.js && webpack --mode production --config webpack.config.js
scripts.buildDev: rm -rf build && webpack --mode development --config webpack.server.js && webpack --mode development --config webpack.config.js
